data.text: Haiwa Jehovha, ndinodana kwamuri; kurumidzai kuuya kwandiri.
Munyengetero wangu ngauiswe pamberi penyu sezvinonhuhwira;
Isai murindi pamuromo wangu, imi Jehovha;
Mwoyo wangu ngaurege kukweverwa kune zvakaipa,
Ivo vachati, â€œSezvinoita anorima achiparura pasi,
Asi meso angu anotarira kwamuri, imi Ishe Jehovha;
